mapper.select: SELECT id, symbol, interval, open_time, close_time, open_price, high_price, low_price, close_price, volume, quote_volume, trades_count, create_time, update_time FROM market_kline WHERE symbol = #{symbol} AND interval = #{interval} ORDER BY open_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO market_kline ( symbol, interval, open_time, close_time, open_price, high_price, low_price, close_price, volume, quote_volume, trades_count, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
( #{kline.symbol}, #{kline.interval}, #{kline.openTime}, #{kline.closeTime}, #{kline.openPrice}, #{kline.highPrice}, #{kline.lowPrice}, #{kline.closePrice}, #{kline.volume}, #{kline.quoteVolume}, #{kline.tradesCount}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE market_kline SET high_price = GREATEST(high_price, #{kline.highPrice}), low_price = LEAST(low_price, #{kline.lowPrice}), close_price = #{kline.closePrice}, volume = volume + #{kline.volume}, quote_volume = quote_volume + #{kline.quoteVolume}, trades_count = trades_count + #{kline.tradesCount}, update_time = NOW() WHERE symbol = #{kline.symbol} AND interval = #{kline.interval} AND open_time = #{kline.openTime}
